articles.title: What Boston looked like in 2019 when the Patriots last won the Super Bowl
articles.description:
A snapshot of the city and culture from the year New England claimed its sixth Super Bowl win in 2019.

The post What Boston looked like in 2019 when the Patriots last won the Super Bowl appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston celebrated the Patriots' sixth Super Bowl win in 2019 with city-wide festivities.
Local businesses saw a 20% increase in sales during the Super Bowl celebrations.
Patriots' victory strengthened community pride and engagement among Boston residents.

articles.title: Officer and civilian shot, suspect killed in Spencer
articles.description:
After the suspect shot a person and fled, he barricaded himself in a bathroom, where an exchange of gunfire resulted in his death and the injuries to the officer, officials say.

The post Officer and civilian shot, suspect killed in Spencer appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Officer injured and suspect killed after gunfire exchange in Spencer incident.
Suspect barricaded in a bathroom after shooting a civilian before police engagement.
Local residents may experience increased police presence and safety measures in Spencer.

articles.title: Cape Cod house with Watergate ties falls victim to eroding bluff
articles.description:
On Feb. 3, demolition began on the Bartlett House in Eastham, bringing to the forefront its storied past.

The post Cape Cod house with Watergate ties falls victim to eroding bluff appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Demolition of the historic Bartlett House in Eastham began on February 3.
The house is linked to the Watergate scandal involving Richard Nixon.
Erosion of the bluff poses ongoing risks to coastal properties in the region.
